<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="97" y="108"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:JOIN_TF</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="6"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§b歡迎您 §c</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="entity_name"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> §6第一次進入菘菘的幻想世界!!!</field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">遇到任何問題記得查看【菘菘的幻想世界辭典】
</field></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">或者到官方Discord詢問(https://discord.gg/gjmazfF9Rj) 
</field></block></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">您也會獲得【初學者禮物】記得領取喔w       模組開發者-菘菘 敬上。</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BeginnersGifts</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:JOIN_TF</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:JOIN_TF</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§b歡迎 §c</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="entity_name"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> §b進入菘菘的幻想世界!!!</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
